task.name: behaviors.tasks.CommitSuicideAttack
task.description: To commit a suicide attack on a given target agent, using the 'launchProjectile' skill. the agent will follow the target agent (a non-teammate, a teammate or a crowd) and launch the choosen projectile on it. This skill make the agent commit suicide, using the "commitSuicide" action on itself.

parameter.name: targetAgent
parameter.description: The target to launch projectile on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resourse to use per time unit.

parameter.name: dotationType
parameter.description: The type of projectile (resource dotation type) to launch to hit the target.
